global.summary: Atmospheric radiation parameters corresponding to Remote Sensing Systems (RSS) Resampled brightness temperature
global.keywords: EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > ATMOSPHERIC RADIATION > SPECTRAL IRRADIANCE, EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > ATMOSPHERIC RADIATION > TRANSMITTANCE
global.title: Atmospheric radiation parameters computed from ERA5 profile on a 0.25 degree Earth grid, time interpolated to satellite overpass time
global.history: Created from ERA5 data downloaded from the Copernicus Climate Data Store using the RSS radiative transfer model
